ghclass 0.1.0

Get organization teams

get_teams.Rd

get_teams returns a (filtered) data frame of teams in the organization with columns for their names (name) and their unique ids (id).

get_teams(org, filter = NULL, exclude = FALSE)

Arguments

org

character, name of the GitHub organization.
filter

character, regex pattern for matching (or excluding) repos.
exclude

logical, should entries matching the regex be excluded or included.

See also

Other github organization related functions: create_individual_repo, create_team_repo, create_team, get_members, get_pending_members, get_pending_team_members, get_repos, get_team_members, get_team_repos, invite_user

Examples

# NOT RUN {
get_team_repos("ghclass",c("team01","team02"))
# }
